I’d like to commend the artist for his/her 2 new doujins, the art style got a lot better with the angle or the shots of poses as you may call it, and the panels became cleaner compare to the previous doujins.

Though the story I think kinda needs a buildup for the sex scenes. Something compelling. The pacing from the coitus gallery to MC’s POV, and then switch again to sex scenes is kinda awkward.

I’d prefer it if could be as simple as main story-sex scene-reconciliation or some sort.

So if I got the story right the guy and girl loves each other but can't confess, girl is all over him but the guy is shy. Then they separate and she get's a bf who with his big D reshapes her into only wanting his D but he treats her like dirt then breaks up so shy guy asks them to date but then big D guy goes back when he's away and easily convince her to take his D instead. Then the last few pages and ending makes it seem like she still loves the shy guy a lot but because his D is small and she's been shaped to love the big D he just becomes her pet that she loves to watch while she get's fucked. So yeah kinda fucked up in the way that she loves shy guy but her body is made to love the big D which he can't provide.
